title: need help with RP!
body: So basically, i transferred my main to EUW so i could play with my friend. But now i cant figure out how to purchase rp. if i bought a normal card from target or something it would be locked to NA, im pretty sure. and since im going to have a gift card i cant really just put it on my debit card and buy it that way. so what do i do o.o thank you for any help!

replies.body:
Hi VioletWhispers!

We completely understand what your saying.  We actually do allow a ***single, one-time exception*** for players who purchased an RP card in their old region before transferring their account to their new region.  If you wish, you can read more about this announcement here:

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4316004

If you do have an RP card on NA, feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to help take care of it!  ^.^
